a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Strategic warheads are designed for use away from the battlefield, such as against military bases, arms industries
or infrastructure. Deployed are those on ballistic missiles, submarines, or bomber bases. Retired are those
Data source: Federation of American Scientists (2023)
Note: The exact number of countries' warheads is secret, and the estimates are based on publicly available information, historical
records, and occasional leaks. Warheads vary substantially in their power.
